name: Roll A Bolt
description:
---v0.2 - Pause menu, quit game, elevator
--- v0.1 - Move ball, collect gold, jump powerup, switches enigma, dynamic texts

I used Stencyl for a long time for my demos, but I decided to try visual scripting on Unity with Bolt.

I used the scene of the tutorial "Roll a Ball" of Unity and added a lot of changes!

The demo is for the moment short but it allowed me to convince myself of the potential of Bolt, and it's really good !
